author: Charmaine J. Forde

quote: Just by writing this story, I thought that I am the real monster, I had the feeling that I am doing it.... it was just awful!
author: Deyth Banger, It's not a happy

quote: Georgie,' he said. Then he kissed her. That was it, really. That was when she added Neal to the list of things she wanted and needed and was bound to have someday. That's when she decided that Neal was the person who was going to drive on those overnight trips. And Neal was the one who is going to sit next to her at the Emmys. He kissed her like he was drawing a perfectly straight line. He kissed her in India ink. That's when Georgie decided, during that cocksure kiss, that Neal was what she needed to be happy.
author: Rainbow Rowell, Landline

quote: Radiate a Smile with a Happy Face,and you make everyone Happy,Make a sad faceand you Scare everyone !
author: Sham Hinduja

quote: Some feel lucky, if they haven't got to be happy, as they don’t like their frame of mind to be unravelled and prefer to be left well enough alone. ( "C’est quand le bonheur ?" )
author: Erik Pevernagie
category: bonheur, feel, frame-of-mind, happy, leave-alone, like, lucky, prefer, unravelled

quote: The beauty with modest smile, whose secrecy of silent love had just been stolen, beamed at this wonderful offer and she replenished herself with his love as a carefree child cossetted with luxurious warmth after a cold shower.
author: Ashmita Acharya, The Beginning: The Tears of My Heart
category: affairs-of-heart, blush, blushing-girl, first-love, happy, love, love-affair, love-at-first-sight, love-quotes, proposal, romance, secrecy, secret-love, silent-love, stolen-heart

quote: Wake every morning with the same feeling. Live up high and fly on top of the ceiling. I just know that I'm on my way. It doesn't matter to me if I'm chasing the clouds away. North or South, East or West I live my life to the fullest.
author: Ana Claudia Antunes, A-Z of Happiness: Tips for Living and Breaking Through the Chain that Separates You from Getting That Dream Job
category: fly-high, flying-spirit, happy, live-an-extraordinary-life, live-in-the-moment, live-life-to-the-fullest, reach-up, reaching-for-your-dreams, to-the-sky, to-the-t

quote: I'm not sure anyone knows what they're looking for until they find it
author: Kiera Cass, The Heir
category: happy, love, love-quote, romance, sweet, true

quote: You can't feel the essence of Happiness unless you overcome your Sadness.
author: Mohith Agadi
category: happiness, happiness-quotes, happy, life, life-quotes, quote, quotes, quotes-by-mohith

quote: You can't spell impossible without spelling possible!
author: Rebekah Apel

quote: I'm on my way...don't know where to, but my road is build with metaphors and nonsense
author: Yesenia Barkley
category: building-a-life, day-by-day, happy, inspirational, moving-forward, working-hard

quote: Things you Do to live a Happy life, shouldn't ruin others'.
author: Mohith Agadi
category: do, doings, happiness, happiness-quotes, happy, happy-life, life, life-quotes, live, quotes, quotes-by-mohith, selfishness

quote: I do not want India to be an economic superpower. I want India to be a happy country.
author: J.R.D. Tata

quote: I'm surprised I could actually talk with how much I was grinning.
author: N.R. Walker, Spencer Cohen, Book One
category: andrew-landon, dating, happiness, happy, laughter, lgbt, lgbtq, love, mm-romance, smiling, spencer-cohen

quote: The one who stands alone can become a winner, but can he be happy
author: Prabakaran Thirumalai

quote: --And the good thing about feeling happy, you know, Valentin? ...It's that you think it's forever, that one's never ever going to feel unhappy again.
author: Manuel Puig, Kiss of the Spider Woman

quote: If it makes you happy, it’s what you’re supposed to do.
author: Pat Rodegast

quote: Might not live long but I know I'ma die happy.
author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett
category: accomplish-the-impossible, death, death-quotes, happy, life, sickness-and-health, sickness-of-the-mind, strong

quote: It's worth all the pain,Now that I found myself back in your arms again.
author: James Reid

quote: I am happiest when I clear my mind and allow the world around me to reteach me what I thought I already knew.
author: Vironika Tugaleva
category: beginner-s-mind, clarity, happiness, happy, tao, wisdom

quote: TO BE HAPPY WITH LIFE AND TO PROGRESS Choose a work 0f your likingChoose the friends you trust and can help in crisis Choose a Book that can enlighten you, and awaken your wisdomChoose a Job where you can do justice for the purpose you are assigned Ignore the people who manipulate the mattersIgnore the world when they do not realise your talentsIgnore the people acting as they possess great talentsHowever you are more successful when we try to listen to everyone to know the depth of ignorance in this world Never forget to live with new ideas and creativity this is what the world thinks as progress.Dr.T.V.Rao MD
author: Dr.T.V.Rao MD

quote: Beware of giggle grins
author: they are highly contagious.

quote: I felt so damn happy all of a sudden, the way old Phoebe kept going around and around. I was damn near bawling, I felt so damn happy, if you want to know the truth.
author: J.D. Salinger, The Catcher in the Rye
category: around, bawling, felt, going, happy, kept, near, sudden

quote: HAPPINESS comes from within. To be happy is to know oneself. It's not in the material things that we own, it's the love we have and show to the world.﻿
author: Angie karan

quote: It's happiness to see you.
author: Larry McMurtry, Lonesome Dove

quote: Every time my stupor turns into vibrancy, standing around is not an option.
author: Saim Cheeda
category: active, happy, option, spirits, standing, stupor, vibrancy

quote: Always ask yourself what will make you happy over the long term.
author: Steven Redhead, Life Is Simply A Game

quote: Smile out loud! Make them wonder.
author: Ljupka Cvetanova, The New Land
category: aphorisms, curiosity, curious, happiness, happiness-quotes, happy, loud, make-a-difference, make-an-impact, make-it-happen, quotes, reason, smile, wisdom, wonder

quote: Happiness is . . . appreciating what we have while having it!
author: Angie karan

quote: Happy is an adult word. You don't have to ask a child about happy, you see it. They are or they are not. Adults talk about being happy because largely they are not. Talking about it is the same as trying to catch the wind. Much easier to let it blow all over you.
author: Jeanette Winterson, The Passion

quote: Don't let the inconsequential fairy tales stand in your way! You do what makes you happy, no matter what.
author: Shannon Hale, The Unfairest of Them All

quote: For ye will know not love, if ye knoweth not your God.
author: Henrietta Newton Martin -Senior Legal Consultant & Author in law. (B.Com,LLB-goldmedalist, LLM-GoldM
category: god, happy, life-and-love, love, romantic-quotes, true-love, valentine, valentine-s-day, valentine-s-day-quotes, wedding-quotes

quote: We can make each other happy, Farah,” Cooper said, lying between my legs and swinging his feet like a kid. His expression was tender as he teased my nipples. “I know you’re mine. If you let me start over, we can be so fucking happy that all the shit that came before will be no more than a bad dream.” “I’m afraid to love you too much.” “It’s normal to be scared when you grew up in a shitty way. I bet you spent most of your life worrying that anything nice might get stolen away. With me, with what we have, it’s probably scary. For me though, losing you is the only thing that scares the shit out of me. I need to make you happy so you’ll stay and I can be happy.
author: Bijou Hunter, Damaged and the Beast

quote: Noticing Cooper watching me, I paused mid-chew. “You really are happy, aren’t you, baby?” “Yes,” I said, stroking his shirt and feeling giddy. I’d never imagined I would share anything like this day with anyone, let alone someone as beautiful as Cooper. “Are you happy?” “If you’re happy, I’m happy. That’s how men are. They like when their women are content.” “Did your dad tell you that?” “Oh, yeah. Pop hasn’t stayed married all these years by being a fool.
author: Bijou Hunter, Damaged and the Beast

quote: I would do my damn best to be more happy than not.
author: Adam Silvera, More Happy Than Not

quote: You’re perfect,” he said, finishing his thought as if she hadn’t interrupted. “I don’t care if you see dead wolves and turn into a living ice sculpture when you’re having a bad day. I don’t care if I have an imprint of your teeth on my shoulder. I don’t care if you’re … fixed.” He spat the word like it tasted bad. “I want you to be safe and happy. That’s all.
author: Marissa Meyer, Winter

quote: If it makes you happy, then you succeeded already.
author: Tyrolin Puxty

quote: He looked out of the window to think, because without a window he couldn’t think. Or maybe it was the other way around: When there was a window, he automatically started to think. Then he wrote, “When I grow up, I am going to be happy.
author: Guus Kuijer, The Book of Everything

quote: I wish I lived in your world, where it's sunshine and puppies all the time.
author: Charlotte Huang, Going Geek
category: dog, happiness, happy, puppies, puppy, sunshine

quote: For the first time, in that night alive with signs and stars, I opened myself to the gentle indifference of the world. Finding it so much like myself—so like a brother really—I felt that I had been happy and that I was happy again.
author: Albert Camus, The Stranger

quote: Try as you might, you'll never be able to please an environmentalist. You can stop using coal to heat your house, you can stop throwing out bottles and cans, you can have every factory in Canada shut down and you can buy only organic gluten-free non-GMO food, you can give up your favorite station wagon for a weird electric hybrid, you can stop developing film and buy a never-ending cycle of digital cameras, you can give up your job at a refinery or mill, and they'll still get after you for not enjoying yourself while doing so.
author: Rebecca McNutt
category: canada, climate, climate-change, coal, earth, ecology, economy, electric-car, environment, factory, fuel, gas, global-warming, happy, hippie, hypocrite, life, mill, mine, oil, pollution, refinery

quote: I am happy to see you, Maso
author: Damon Galgut, Arctic Summer

quote: Some experimenters have reported that an angry face “pops out” of a crowd of happy faces, but a single happy face does not stand out in an angry crowd. The brains of humans and other animals contain a mechanism that is designed to give priority to bad news.
author: Daniel Kahneman
category: angry, behaviour, happy, humans, news, priorities

quote: I am lost to him. I never want to be found.
author: Danielle Pearl, Okay

quote: People say there are thousands of options we have in life. I say we have only two: we can either be happy or be unhappy.
author: Pawan Mishra, Coinman: An Untold Conspiracy
category: be-happy, happiness, happy, life, life-lessons, live-life-to-the-fullest, options, unhappy, wisdom, wise

quote: If you can’t be happy, then be something else. Be useful, that would be good. Decorative, if you like. Selfish, if you must. But don’t whine about it.
author: K.J. Charles, A Fashionable Indulgence

quote: SUMMERthe cattails swayand the bamboodances gently intothe brightness ofa happy day.
author: Tara Estacaan
category: bamboo, gentleness, green, happy, sway, wind

quote: They stopped next at a bookstore. "Oh, what a delicious smell of new books!" said Ellen, as they entered. "Mamma, if it wasn't for one thing, I should say I never was so happy in my life.
author: Susan Bogert Warner

quote: Stop being an adrenaline junkie who is waiting for the happy ending instead of seeing the happy being.
author: Andrea T. Goeglein, Don't Die Waiting to Be Brave

quote: Pleasure can impact your happiness for better or worse, but it is not happiness.
author: James Randall Robison, God Wants You to Be Happy

quote: At any rate, Therese thought, she was happier than she ever had been before. And why worry about defining everything?
author: Patricia Highsmith, The Price of Salt
category: defining, fluid-sexuality, happy, labels, lesbian, lgbt, patricia-highsmith, sexuality, the-price-of-salt

quote: I love happy people
author: they’re like smile magnets.

quote: Happiness has two hands: one with strength for lifting up heavy hearts and a gentle hand for tickling.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: happiness, happy, lifting-others, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, tickling, two-hands

quote: After all, why be right when you can be happy.
author: Tom Holt, The Good, the Bad and the Smug

quote: Being happy is a requisite for longevity.
author: Chidi Prosper Agbugba
category: happiness, happy, inspirational, longevity, motivational, old-age, success

quote: If you would have watched her from the roof, you would have seen a broad grin over her face.
author: Devanshi Gupta, Mysterious Mrs. Jain

quote: I had never seen so many stars shimmering in the sky ever before. It pleased me.
author: Devanshi Gupta, The Secret of Volcanic Island

quote: What if, when we are feeling less than happy, we were prescribed two genuinely inspiring experiences each day?
author: Elaina Marie, Happiness is Overrated - Live the Inspired Life Instead

quote: Being together does not always mean happy.
author: Girdhar Joshi, Some Mistakes Have No Pardon

quote: If you plan to be happy, you will find at least one reason to be happy. Real happiness is never accidental. Discover happiness on your terms.
author: Olarewaju Oladipo, 3SqMeals Tweets: Not Your Typical Meal - Volume 2

quote: Wanting to be happy is not stupid.
author: Lauren DeStefano, Fever

quote: Happiness is self-contained and self-sufficient. Happy men have no time and no use for you. Happy men are free men.
author: Ayn Rand, The Fountainhead

quote: ...if ever you hear a man telling you that you must be happy, that it’s your natural right, that your first duty is to yourself—that will be the man who’s not after your soul.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Smile and be happy because there is no one in this whole world like you. You're lucky because you're alive and breathing. Show gratitude and show it genuinely.
author: Assegid Habtewold, The 9 Cardinal Building Blocks: For Continued Success in Leadership

quote: Happiness is bliss.
author: J.R. Rim

quote: the lonely mind wanders.the happy mind goes.the weary mind travels.the thoughtful mind flows.
author: Barry DeCarli

quote: Mamoon went on, “The news I bring is to say that, man being the only animal who hates himself, the likely fate of the world is total self-destruction.” He raised his glass. “All the best then, my friends. Here’s to a happy apocalypse.”“Happy apocalypse,” murmured the other guests, obediently.
author: Hanif Kureishi, The Last Word

quote: Happiness should be like filling a bucket with things that make you happy, you should take your bucket cut the bottom out and constantly fill it and never stop because the happiness should be in the act of filling the bucket, not the bucket being filled.
author: Jayden Pearce
category: happiness, happiness-life, happiness-quote, happiness-quotes, happy, happy-life, how-to-be-happy

quote: I love football. I love the aesthetics of football. I love the athleticism of football. I love the movement of the players, the antics of the coaches. I love the dynamism of the fans. I love their passion for their badge and the colour of their team and their country. I love the noise and the buzz and the electricity in the stadium. I love the songs. I love the way the ball moves and then it flows and the way a teams fortune rises and falls through a game and through a season. But what I love about football is that it brings people together across religious divides, geographic divides, political divides. I love the fact that for ninety minutes in a rectangular piece of grass, people can forget hopefully, whatever might be going on in their life, and rejoice in this communal celebration of humanity. The biggest diverse, invasive or pervasive culture that human kinds knows is football and I love the fact that at the altar of football human kind can come worship and celebrate.
author: Andy Harper
category: football, football-clubs, happiness, happy, inspirational, motivation, sports

quote: To give means to think, every single day, about what you can do to make people happy.
author: Ryuho Okawa

quote: Being happy where you are does not mean that you must unquestioningly accept parts of your environment that don't serve you. Where you are is inside of this amazing body, this beautiful moment, this capable mind. Where you are is inside of an eternal opportunity. And sometimes you need to change your environment to remember that.
author: Vironika Tugaleva
category: acceptance, change, happiness, happy, self-discovery, self-knowledge, where-you-are

quote: Human beings are more or less formulas. Pun intended. We are not any one thing that is mathematically provable. We are more or less than we are anything. We are more or less kind, or more or less not. More or less selfish, happy, wise, lonely.
author: Adi Alsaid, Never Always Sometimes
category: anything, black-and-white, formulas, happy, humans, kind, less, lonely, math, more, proof, selfish, wise

quote: Why are you smiling like that?""I'm just happy.""Why?""Because you're here. You're real. And you're mine.
author: Jay McLean, More Than Him

quote: Men of profound sadness betray themselves when they are happy: they have a mode of seizing upon happiness as though they would choke and strangle it, out of jealousy--ah, they know only too well that it will flee from them!
author: Friedrich Nietzsche, Beyond Good and Evil
category: betray, beyond-good-and-evil, choke, friedrich-nietzsche, happiness, happy, jealousy, profound-sadness, strangle

quote: She put on her lace collar. She put on her new hat and he never noticed
author: and he was happy without her.

quote: He smiled and as his lips parted, little bits of solid waste fell from them. Hellelujah, we can only be what we are, I thought and wondered if I was as repulsive to him as he was to me. I don't think so, because even though he literally wore a shit-eating grin, I sensed he was genuinely happy to see me
author: R.E. Vance, Paradise Lot: GoneGodWorld - Episode Two

quote: What's your happy place?""With you.
author: A. Meredith Walters, Chasing the Tide

quote: I want an ending when the woman is happy instead of good.
author: Elin Hilderbrand, The Rumor

quote: What you do in your dreams is never your choice. But it made me happy anyway.
author: Sarah Dessen, Saint Anything

quote: Il me semble que je serais toujours bien la ou je ne suis pas.It seems to me that I will always be happy in the place where I am not.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: You do the right thing even if it makes you feel bad. The purpose of life is not to be happy but to be worthy of happiness.
author: Tracy Kidder
category: happiness, happy, purpose-of-life, right-thing, virtuous, worthy

quote: The gap inside you needs someone who deserves you to feel it. Once you found him/her you will always feel the deep happiness that you never had before. Love will always be there watching.
author: Jean Nshimiyimana

quote: But some things are more important than being happy. Like being free to think for yourself.
author: Jon Krakauer, Under the Banner of Heaven: A Story of Violent Faith

quote: Happy! who can answer for that? Happiness or unhappiness is the secret known but to oneself…
author: Alexandre Dumas, The Count of Monte Cristo

quote: Don't waste your time thinking about things you can't change, live in the moment
author: Sarah alhussinan
category: forget, happy, life, live-in-the-moment, smile, strong

quote: I feel a strange sensation brewing inside of me. It tickles my throat and forces my lips into a grin. Before I can stifle it, I giggle. And then I laugh.
author: Kristen Simmons, The Glass Arrow
category: cute, funny, grin, happiness, happy, laugh, smile, strange, tickle

quote: 27. Of all the means which are procured by wisdom to ensure happiness throughout the whole of life, by far the most important is the acquisition of firends.
author: Epicurus, Principal Doctrines

quote: The only depth where I can breathe, and don't need to fight for air, is in your love.
author: Anthony Liccione
category: air, at-peace, bliss, breathe, content, deepness, depth, drown, fight, happy, love

quote: Happiness is truly priceless. It costs you nothing.
author: Donald L. Hicks, Look into the stillness

quote: Keep your eyes on your blessings not your problems
author: Sarah alhussinan

quote: Madam: Are you lucky, Debora?Debora: What do you mean?Madam: Well, you don't look that happy today...Debora: Is it that clear?
author: Debora van der Velde
category: conversation, debora, dialogue, happy, jacco, lucky, welle

quote: A book is like a vacation for the brain.
author: Rachel Adams

quote: He looked at Hector's list and told him that, thanks to a lot of studies and calculations, they'd shown that if you compared yourself to others and didn't find yourself wanting, if you had no money or health problems, if you had friends, a close-knit family, a job you liked, if you were religious and practised your religion, if you felt useful, if you went for a little stroll from time to time, and all of this in a country that was run by not very bad people, where you were taken care of when things went wrong, your chances of bring happy were greatly increased.
author: François Lelord, Hector and the Search for Happiness

quote: when i am depressed i never think i will be happy.when i am happy i never think i will be depressed2015
author: Jane Yates

quote: I like looking nice, but I always put comfort over fashion. I don't find thin girls attractive; be happy and healthy. I've never had a problem with the way I loo. I'd rather have lunch with my friends than go to the gym.
author: Adele

quote: You live longer once you realise that any time spent being unhappy is wasted.
author: Ruth E. Renki

quote: It's so frustrating that everybody rags on eighties music, when there's a lot of terrific stuff out there," he said. "There's no irony to it. It's not afraid to just be happy or enthusiastic or earnest. Or to have melody. Sure, you can blame it for being naive, but isn't that refreshing next to the whiny navel-gazing that came after it?
author: Amanda DeWees, The Shadow and the Rose
category: earnest, eighties, enthusiastic, happy, melody, music, naive, pop-music

quote: You shall discuss dreams, not deny!
author: Cass van Krah

quote: All right. Let’s pretend I’m so incredibly happy my brain is thinking about rainbows and butterflies and I’m waving good morning to the mailman. I let my guard down. Next thing I know, something takes a dark turn. But I don’t even realize it because I’m over here staring at a bright patch of happy light. All of a sudden, I’ve fallen into a hole and have no rope, no ladder, and the walls are too slippery to climb out of. Happiness makes me lose focus. It makes me weak. I can’t stand it. Does that make sense to you now?
author: Elisa Marie Hopkins

quote: I looked like someone who'd had a night, and had a story to tell about it.
author: Morgan Matson, Since You've Been Gone
category: happy, night, smile, socialite, someone, special

quote: I would apologize for my rudeness, if I had any manners. Happily, I don't.
author: Tamora Pierce, Emperor Mage

quote: The happiest people aren't necessarily the most successful, or the most popular, or the most talented. They're the ones who are interested in the people around them.
author: Katie Kacvinsky, Still Point

quote: When it's all said and done, I hope to die with a smile on my face.
author: Anthony Liccione
category: best-effort, changes, content, die, fulfillmentfillment, gratification, happy, in-the-end, life, peace, realization, satisfied, smile, success

quote: Not everyone who sleeps, wakes up the next day. You are blessed.Be happy.
author: Manoj Arora, Happiness Unlimited: How to be happy always

quote: I realized I would always be missing something. That no matter what I did, I would always be missing something else. And the only way to live, the only way to be happy, was to make sure the things I didn’t miss meant more to me than the things I missed. I had to think about what I wanted, outside the heat of wanting.
author: David Levithan, How They Met, and Other Stories

quote: I recognize that I have the ability to be selfish, but I also recognize that you can't be happy if you only care about yourself at the expense of other people.
author: Russell Brand

quote: Colour GLOWS, Mind FLOWSBird FLY. Love SPREADS,And we Celebrate Joy, Love & Smile.Have a Happy Bright Merry Christmas to Ü & All
author: krvishal
category: christmas, christmas-quotes, happy, merry-christmas, positive-attitude, positive-life, xmas

quote: she seemed happy, though perhaps a bit desperately so
author: John  Williams

quote: What's matter of importance is that if you can make your ownself laugh and smile.
author: Shailee J-N
category: happy, independent, life, philosophy, quotes, simple, smile

quote: Should teach us that there are no happy endings, so no desilusionariamos us if we did not get our happy ending.
author: Kat Unda

quote: As my creator, God knows better than I do what will truly make me happy.
author: Paula Hendricks

quote: You're only here for a short visit. Don't hurry, don't worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.
author: Walter Hagen

quote: My heart do be so big," she whispered. "It be so big and I do reckon I be about the happiest kid for it.
author: Torey L. Hayden

quote: The happiest adults are those who never buried old toys or abandoned imaginary friends.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: adults, happiness, happy, happy-adults, happy-life, imaginary-friends, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, toys, young-at-heart

quote: Was it the happiest day of our lives? Probably not, if only because the truly happy days tend not to involve so much organisation, are rarely so public or so expensive. The happy ones sneak up, unexpected.
author: David Nicholls, Us

quote: Because every time you see them happy you remember how sad they're going to be. And it breaks your heart. Because what's the point in them being happy now if they're going to be sad later. The answer is, of course, because they a re going to be sad later.
author: Steven Moffat, Doctor Who: The Shooting Scripts

quote: Don't try to be happy, just be happy. Because your happiness does not depend on others. Be the reason for your own happiness.
author: Vishwas Chavan

quote: They all want to be happy. They all think they should be happy. And they’re quick to trot out their most cherished document and point to where they were promised “life, liberty and the pursuit of happiness.” But you’ll find that though they all parrot that little phrase, they think none too hard about that word “pursuit”. To follow, to chase, to inquire, to hunt, to seek. To track in order to overtake and capture. This they don’t do. Instead, having been offered a promise of happiness, they progress to a feeling of entitlement for happiness, then make the leap that happiness should, therefore, be easily won, automatic. There’s too much wrong in there to even scratch at that!
author: Geoffrey Wood
category: automatic, christian-fiction, christianity, entitlement, grimrack, happiness, happy, liberty, life, pursuit, religion

quote: The best gift you can give yourself is to give to someone else
author: Manuel Corazzari

quote: Many want to take care their wallet but I think that is not so important if You are not Happy
author: Jan Jansen

quote: Just a perfect day, problems all left alone.
author: Lou Reed, Perfect Day

quote: So your final assignment is a simple one but it’s going to take forever: be happy. No matter what it takes. No matter how embarrassing it might be sometimes, no matter who or what you might have to forgive, no matter how hideous the color of the hat that makes you smile, be happy.
author: Beth Harbison, Chose the Wrong Guy, Gave Him the Wrong Finger

quote: The life is all about sharing a little part of your life to make others happy, to became happy.
author: Harsh Singh

quote: Sales is my Religion and Customer is my God and I Worship Him, The only thing is that my God is not very happy n generous always.
author: honeya
category: customer, god, happy, pray, religion, sales, salesman, salesmanship, salesmen, sell, selling, worship

quote: The first step in becoming a truly happy person is to make peace with your life. The second step will be to spread that peace into your environment.
author: Gracia Hunter

quote: Own your happiness and let people understand that they have to own theirs. If you make it your job to make people happy, you have made it your job to keep people happy.
author: Saji Ijiyemi

quote: After six long hours of driving and three rest stops, Tiger pulls up to a snow-topped, metal speaker box just outside the State Penitentiary's first gate in Walla Walla. As he rolls down his window and snow flies in his face, Joshua starts begging for a Happy Meal.I turn around, snapping at him. "This ISN'T MCDONALDS and YOU AREN'T HUNGRY. NOW SHUT UP BRAT."A loud scratchy masculine voice blasts out of the speaker. "CAN I HELP YOU?"Tiger leans out the window, as he answers- We're here to visit Raven Chandler."HAVE YOU BEEN HERE BEFORE?""Yes sir. I've been here A LOT." "WHERE'S HIS MOTHER?""I don't know.. I haven't seen her in months.""NOT THE PRISONER'S MOTHER. THE BRAT IN THE BACK SEAT OF YOUR JEEP.""Oh- HIM-" As he turns, smiling and sticking his tongue out at Joshua, I lean towards his window to answer the guard's question. "SHE'S IN VEGAS, SIR. I'M BABYSITTING. HE'S MY GODSON." When the speaker remains disturbingly silent for far too long, I continue. "HE'S A GOOD BOY SIR. HE WON'T BE ANY TROUBLE- I SWEAR." "THAT'S RIGHT," Tiger said. "HE SWEARS ON THE LITTLE BRAT'S MOTHER'S GRAVE.
author: Giorge Leedy, Uninhibited From Lust To Love
category: babysitting, brat, chandler, disturbing, driving, gay, gay-romance, gay-romance-erotica, god-son, grave, happy, hungry, jeep, mcdonalds, meal, mother, prison, prisoner, raven, snow, swear, trouble, vegas, visit, walla

quote: A happy birthday is measured not in the amount of gifts one gets, but in the amount one is loved.
author: Todd Stocker

quote: And since he was seeing more and more people who were unhappy for no apparent reason, he was becoming more and more tired, and even a little unhappy himself. He began to wonder if he was in the right profession, whether he was happy with life, whether he wasn't missing out on something. And then he felt very afraid because he wondered whether these unhappy people were contagious.
author: François Lelord, Hector and the Search for Happiness
category: afraid, happiness, happy, life, profession, realisation, right, search, tired, unhappiness, unhappy, work

quote: Eat Ice Cream. Read Books. Be Happy.
author: Carew Papritz
category: books, carew-s-quotes, eat, happy, ice-cream, legacy-quotes, quotes, read, the-legacy-letters

quote: I can't force your lips to smile, but I can show them how easily mine do.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: happiness, happy, make-someone-happy, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, smile, smiling

quote: Perfection is an illusion. Allow yourself room to make mistakes and permission to be happy regardless of outcome.
author: Dawn Gluskin
category: acceptance, allow, control, flow, happy, imperfect, mistakes, perfection, permission

quote: Sometimes, people you value the most may appreciate all the things you do for them. but that doesn't mean they value you as much you value them. you sacrifice for them and give them all the best because you want them to be happy and you believe they deserve it. You understand and accept them for everything that they are. There are times that you'll ran short and would fail to be at your best and they may take it againts you. you'll have your own share of your weaknesses and flaws and they may not understand you and accept you. You may have been lost at times and they may not look for you or care for you and that's okay. that's the thing about giving. you give without expecting, you give without regrets and you give whole heartedly and freely. For God will always bless you with more than what you give. and it's already fulfilling to see them somehow smile and became complete and still thankful because you did something good for them and that's all that matters.
author: Cristopher Capistrano
category: fulfillment, give, giving, god, happy, thankful

quote: Don’t take life too seriously! Nobody gets out alive anyway. Smile. Be goofy. Take chances. Have fun. Inspire.
author: Dawn Gluskin
category: chances, fun, goofy, happy, inspire, life, love, smile

quote: Open your heart! Even in trying times. Relax. Breathe. Allow. Feel lighter, happier, and at peace.
author: Dawn Gluskin
category: breathe, feel, happy, heart, love, open, peace, relax

quote: If you want to be happy, be wary of focusing on past events and do your best to live in the present.
author: Roy  Bennett

quote: I'm not the type of guy that will make you happy. I'm the type of guy that will make you forget how unhappy we all are.
author: James Karrigan

quote: Night is my time...am not a vampire but i am a Night Rider....!
author: Nadeem v Abdu
category: awesome, bike-touring, bikers, cool, happy, life, moonlight, nightlight, nightmares, rider, riders, stunt, traveler, traveling

quote: When the rain falls you just let it fall and you grin like a madman and you dance with it, because if you can make yourself happy in the rain then you're doing pretty alright in life.
author: Rachel Cohn, Nick & Norah's Infinite Playlist

quote: Don't think, just feel it. I know you do; I can see it on your face.
author: Megan   Smith, Trying Not to Love You
category: friendship, happiness, happy, life, love, relationships, romance

quote: Happy is the man who enjoy warmth of the sun and refresh in the breeze, who is secure within and say I have lived to-day.
author: Kishore Bansal

quote: As useful as an unhappy artist. As useless as a happy philosopher.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana, N for Nigger: Aphorisms for Grown Children and Childish Grown-ups
category: art, artists, happiness, happy, philosophers, unhappiniess, unhappy, useful, useless

quote: everyone who terrifies you is sixy-five percent water, and everyone you love is made of stardust, and I know sometimes you cannot even breathe deeply, and the night sky is no home, and you have cried yourself to sleep enough times that you are down to your last two percent, but nothing is infinite, not even loss. you are made of the sea and the stars and one day you are going to find yourself again.
author: Finn Butler

quote: They asked a wise man: Why don’t we ever hear you backbiting and slandering?He said: I’m still not happy with myself to start with others.
author: Ahmad Musa Jibril
category: happy, inspirational, tibetan-buddhism, wisdom, wise, zen

quote: A truly happy person is one who can enjoy the scenery on a detour.
author: Gregory Benford, Shipstar

quote: I had this dream about you last night. We were still married. I was giving you a haircut, like I always did, being careful to trim around the scar on the back of your head. I’m sorry I sometimes forgot it and left you with a bald spot. And, I’m sorry we didn’t work out. But you look pretty happy on Instagram.
author: Crystal Woods, Dreaming is for lovers
category: bald, careful, dreaming, dreams, haircut, happy, instagram, love, marriage, nostalgia, relationships, scars, sorrow

quote: If your happy and you know it a smiley face will surely show it : ) Netiquette by NetworkEtiquette.net
author: David Chiles
category: digital-etiquette, email, happy, internet-etiquette, internet-rap, internet-rap-records, irap, message, netiquette, network-etiquette, smiley, smiley-face, social-media

quote: Happy is very abstract, you can't touch it.
author: Julius Veal

quote: This is what I chose. This is it." I look over Robert's shoulder. The Dauntless guards seem to have finished examining the truck. The bearded man gets back into the driver's seat and closes the door behind him. "Besides, Robert. The goal of my life isn't just...to be happy." "Wouldn't it be easier if it was, though?" he says
author: Veronica Roth, Divergent

quote: You are the only person who can make you happy and whole. You do not have another half out there waiting to be discovered.
author: Raphael Zernoff, I Am

quote: When I write, my soul sings.
author: Melissa Marsh
category: authorship, happy, inspirational, singing, soul, write, writing

quote: If you are happy, you can give happiness. If you don't love yourself and if you are unhappy with yourself, you can't give anything else but that.
author: Gisele Bundchen
category: giving, happiness, happy, inspirational, life, love, yourself

quote: And they lived ever after, whether they were happy about it or not.
author: Allyse Near, Fairytales for Wilde Girls

quote: Happiness is the anticipation of future happines.
author: Anna Carey, Eve

quote: All bad things, like good things, must end.
author: Nihar Sharma, The Battlefield Flower

quote: The happiest people are not the ones with the best or the most things, but those who most appreciate what they have.
author: Oliver Gaspirtz
category: appreciating-life, appreciation, being-grateful, greed, happiness, happy, materialistic

quote: But I was - not quite happy. Pending happy. I knew this was not really my life
author: it was a borrowed life. One that I was temporarily wearing until I could sort out my own.

quote: A good wife keeps you happy in bed, but a better wife keeps you happier even out of the bed.
author: M.F. Moonzajer, LOVE, HATRED AND MADNESS

quote: So many times we have told ourselves that we are not good enough. So many times the world has told us too. It is in those times that we must find ourselves and do the best we can. You and I today, let’s prove the world wrong.
author: Nihar Sharma, The Battlefield Flower

quote: Anyone who recommends attention to the moment as a prescription for grateful wonder is only telling half the truth. To be happy one must pay attention, but to be unhappy one must also have paid attention.
author: Philip Lopate

quote: That awkward moment when you realize someone was actually home the whole time you were singing on the tops of your lungs.
author: Kasey Collin P. Dumdum
category: awkward, funny, happy, humor, joke, singing

quote: Don't be happy at me.
author: Jeffrey Brown, Kids Are Weird: And Other Observations from Parenthood

quote: I believe in happy endings, and i feel this movie has advanced long enough.
author: Matthew Quick, The Silver Linings Playbook
category: believe-in-others, believe-in-yourself, end, favorite-book, happy, happy-endings, love, love-it

quote: what a life without a smile, so show some life smile
author: Futty-fuze

quote: By all of your beauty I am so inspired. Your love has baptized me by fire.
author: India Arie

quote: You more than anyone else dederve to be loved and happy. Do not remain in any relationship that robs you of those two things.
author: Nancy Arroyo Ruffin, Letters to My Daughter: A Collection of Short Stories and Poems about Love, Pride, and Identity

quote: the biggest reward of a lifetime is finishing day after day with a smile in you face.
author: Nuno Rosa
category: familie, happy, lifetime, love, reward, smile

quote: happy to see me and unhappy to see me at the same time
author: David Levithan, Every Day

quote: Not every one of us are born or made free of our own prisons to the extent of ourselves.
author: M.F. Moonzajer, LOVE, HATRED AND MADNESS

quote: Understanding of reality is the main key of happiness :)
author: Arya vidhan

quote: Everyone is beautiful and talented in their own special way. Some people can sing, dance, play instruments, teach, and more. You may not be in the hall of fame, but you possess the ability to inspire others. Recognize your talents and continue to be creative. Share your beautiful gifts with the world
author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana
category: beauty, faith, faithfulness, happiness, happy, hope, inspiration, inspirational, inspire, life, living-life, love, peace

quote: Perhaps he still hopes. If there’s any justice in the Gods’ injustice, then may they let us keep our dreams, even when they’re impossible, and may our dreams be happy, even when they’re trivial....Every dream is the same dream, for they’re all dreams. Let the Gods change my dreams, but not my gift for dreaming.
author: Fernando Pessoa, The Book of Disquiet

quote: I smile broadly, feeling as warm and full as the sun.
author: Georgia Clark, Parched

quote: What this world needs now… more balloons and clowns
author: David W. Earle

quote: Do you, good people, believe that Adam and Eve were created in the Garden of Eden and that they were forbidden to eat from the tree of knowledge? I do. The church has always been afraid of that tree. It still is afraid of knowledge. Some of you say religion makes people happy. So does laughing gas. So does whiskey. I believe in the brain of man.
author: Clarence Darrow
category: adam-and-eve, brain, church, creationism, eden, fear, garden-of-eden, genesis, happy, knowledge, laughing-gas, tree-of-knowledge, whiskey

quote: Happiness is found in the simplest of things. Happiness is found in gratitude, in a kept promise, in a good conversation, in love, in friendship, in an achieved goal, in a fond memory; in all the simple magnificence of life.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Free time was the most precious time, when you should be doing what you loved, or at least slowing down enough to remember what made your life worthwhile and happy.
author: Amy Tan, The Bonesetter's Daughter

quote: Happiness surrounds those who are happy.
author: N.N. Light, Princess of the Light

quote: It's okay to be crazy as long as you keep writing and are happy.
author: Lori Lesko

quote: The economy is getting tough yet we all needs to be happy. It may be difficult to get a job yet we needs to be happy. We may not have money in our pocket yet we needs to be happy so what can you offer to make someone happy even when you don't have a job, money or gifts to offer. Just Smile.....
author: Anthony Iwuchukwu

quote: Being happy isn't necessarily about getting there, it's how you get there.
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quote: The type of love that makes you want to laugh out loud—scream a bit—run in circles—and then repeat? Yeah that’s how I felt about Wes. Totally. Out. Of. Control. Giddiness
author: Rachel Van Dyken, Fearless

quote: ...but I like who I became just fine. That's the way life is. We all try to make something out of our lives, and some of us are just luckier than others.
author: Jimmy Buffett

quote: I am content when writing short stories.
author: Sarah Mazucci
category: content, happy, peaceful, short-stories, story, writing

quote: Don’t focus on outward means of satisfaction if you want to be happy.
author: Trebor Healey, A Horse Named Sorrow

quote: Success is not measured on what you earn, it is how you manage to be happy, benevolent and contented with your life.
author: Sherwin Salinas

quote: Have while you write!
author: Sarah Mazucci

quote: I do not need drugs to be a genius, do not take a genius to be human, but I need your smile to be happy.

category: be-human, charles-chaplin, drugs, genius, happy, need, smile, take, wisdom

quote: I’m glad you’re quitting the bar.""You are?""Yeah. I’ve never liked you working there, and I miss you at the weekend.""Why didn’t you say anything?""Because you seemed happy. It’s sort of my life mission to make sure you stay that way," he teased.
author: Samantha Young, Castle Hill

quote: You shouldn't look too far to find people to care about or people who will care about you. Because if you stop looking, the people who do care will come looking for you.

quote: Don't ever be afraid to show who you really are, because as long as you are happy with yourself, no one else's opinion matters.
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quote: Losing your virginity is a lot like when you find out that Santa doesn’t exist… First you’re slightly disappointed, and then you’re happy because you’re in on the secret
author: Ben Mitchell

quote: No one does. No one really knows how to be happy. You just get close, sometimes. That’s all I want – just to be close.
author: Robert Jackson Bennett, American Elsewhere

quote: What would you rather be, Jackie? Angry mad or crazy mad? I think I'd rather be crazy mad, because you can be crazy and still happy.
author: Clare Vanderpool, Navigating Early

quote: Not one idiot in a thousand has been entirely refractory to treatment, not one in a hundred has not been made more happy and healthy; more than thirty per cent have been taught to conform to social and moral law, and rendered capable of order, of good feeling, and of working like the third of a man; more than forty per cent have become capable of the ordinary transactions of life under friendly control, of understanding moral and social abstractions, of working like two-thirds of a man.
author: Edouard Séguin

quote: There are situations where the best solution still doesn't make everyone happy. The trick is understanding what's best.
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour, Economic Warfare: Secrets of Wealth Creation in the Age of Welfare Politics

quote: All Advertising is essentially a promise of future happiness.
author: Suleman Abdullah
category: ads, advertising, brands, happiness, happy, promise, sales

quote: Keep people in your life who truly love you, motivate you, and make you happy. If you know people who do none of these things, let them go.
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quote: Tonight, I decided to take a stroll down to my local liquor store. Maybe I’ll find a refreshment to wash down this full moon. I hate showing up & the clerk fucking knows my name, perhaps because I’m a regular. Anyways got my shit, left…barely covering the tax. Took the long way home; to get away from that haunting typewriter. Sat down at some park bench, as I started to open my poison; A memory rushed into me. A empty bottle of Jack Daniel’s under the Christmas tree. I thought my dad would want another drink, so started to pour my bottle into the dirt & cried.
author: Brandon Villasenor, I Can't Stop Drinking About You
category: drinks, happy, kiss, love, poetry, quotes, story, wild, write, writing

quote: The most #happy is he to whom #ALLAH has given a good #wife.
author: Ali R.A

quote: If you want to be happy you have to work to make it happen. You can't just wish for it and you can't put it in the hands of other people.
author: Michael Buckley, The Everafter War

quote: ‎"We shouldn't wait to be happy until we reach some future point, only to discover that happiness was already available--all the time!
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: Holy shadows of the dead, I am not to blame for your cruel and bitter fate, but the accursed rivalry which brought sister nations and brother people to fight one another. I do not feel happy for this victory of mine. On the contrary, I would be glad, brothers, if I had all of you standing here next to me, since we are united by the same language, the same blood and the same vi
author: Alexander the Great
category: battle, bitter, cruel, death, fight, greece, greek, happy, regret, remorse, rivalry, united, victory, war

quote: Only one wish I have, and that is to die a happy man.
author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett

quote: Fundamental rule in your life, is to know what your deserve in life and getting what you deserve. That's winning always.

category: fight, good-and-evil, good-helath, goodness, happy, inspirational, life, love, mood, motivation, rules, war, warrior, winning

quote: And if sometimes, late at night in bed, I questioned whether or not I truly was insane, I told myself that it didn't matter. I was too happy to care.

category: caspian, crazies, crazy, ghost, happy, the-haunted

quote: Wherever you are, you must be very happy; because I am fasting for your happiness forever
author: M.F. Moonzajer, A moment with God ; Poetry

quote: Who the hell cares about what anybody else thinks? Just look into your heart and do whatever the hell makes you happy.

quote: Choose life, choose to be happy and make somebody smile.
author: Ray S. Jones

quote: I'll be happy when I get married." The faith, the hope, the conviction that marriage is a happy institution, the sincere tone, the lack of any shred of doubt, made the world a better place that moment. I even probed, 'What makes you happy now?' He stuck to his guns," I'll be happy when I get married." Was it naivety or what is hope? Who was I to judge!
author: Andy Paula

quote: I'm not rich as Bill Gates neither I'm famous as Tom Cruise, But trust me I am happier than all of them.
author: Rishabh Surya
category: bill-gates, famous, happiness, happy, money, tom-cruise

quote: We were together for a year
author: she just left me when I pledged her my love.

quote: God doesn't want you to be happy, He wants you to be strong.
author: Brian McGreevy, Hemlock Grove

quote: Galen!" The crown princess flung herself into her husband's arms with a glad cry. The other princesses shrieked and threw themselves at their brother-in-law only a moment later.
author: Jessica Day George, Princess of the Silver Woods

quote: Happiness is simply a habit of looking on the brighter side of everything.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway
category: bright-side, habit, happiness, happy, richelle, richelle-goodrich

quote: His smile wavers. I've been looking at him too long. 'Are you OK?' he says. I nod, take a deep breath. Then I lean over and kiss him.

quote: There is Story Behind every Smile and You Are My Favorite Chapter!!

quote: Life could sometimes be grand.

quote: I sat down at the table, took a deep breath, smiled at Detective Masterson, and nodded at Deputy Slalom. It was going to be a great summer. Normal.

quote: For happy are the merciful for they shall, too, know mercy.
author: David Paul Kirkpatrick, The Address Of Happiness

quote: If it weren’t for the fact that he’d been flat on his back in a full body cast, then recovering, he probably would be glad he missed finishing the school year since it meant he’s now enrolled at his version of Hogwarts.

quote: Been living on this earth for so long now and still don't know what a happy life feels like. I'm ready for a change.
author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett
category: 2013, barack-obama, change, determination, earth, facebook, happy, inspirational, life, love, money, soul

quote: They would be a duet. They would be happy. What is happy, anyways?
author: David Paul Kirkpatrick, The Address Of Happiness

quote: Don't search about happiness in a miserable way.
author: anas alhijjaj

quote: Motivation is the first step in achieving your dreams!
author: Craig Mercier, The Book of Craigisms
category: happy, inspirational, motivational, quotes, quotes-to-live-by, self-help

quote: You do not need to make everyone happy, because you are not paid for.
author: M.F. Moonzajer

quote: I was happy with her and I suspect I never knew her.Would I have been truly happy if I had actually known her?
author: José Eduardo Agualusa, Barroco Tropical

quote: SMILE!!!!! TODAY is the TOMORROW you worried about YESTERDA"Y
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Don’t be gloomy. Do not dwell on unkind things. Stop seeking out the storms and enjoy more fully the sunlight. Even if you are not happy, put a smile on your face. ‘Accentuate the positive.’ Look a little deeper for the good. Go forward in life with a twinkle in your eye and a smile on your face, with great and strong purpose in your heart. Love life.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: I didn't think past the first step of anything, that was the key. I drank a Coke and didn't worry about how to recycle the can or about the acid puddling in my belly, acid so powerful it could strip clean a penny. We went to a dumb movie and I didn't worry about the offensive sexism or the lack of minorities in meaningful roles. I didn't even worry about anything that came next. Nothing had consequence, I was living in the moment, and I could feel myself getting shallower and dumber. But also happy.
author: Gillian Flynn, Gone Girl

quote: Claire, I-Look, my life is one long series of screw-ups and bad decisions, and I know that. I own that. But you...I just want you to be happy. And it cuts me when you're not.""I'm happy with you."She heard the smile in his voice this time. "So what do you really want? A storybook life in Vampireville, with your life on the line every day and a half?""I'm considering it," she said. And she was.
author: Rachel Caine, Fall of Night

quote: At first happiness might seem like just desserts for biological fitness (more accurately, the states that would have led to fitness in the environment in which we evolved). We are happier when we are healthy, well-fed, comfortable, safe, prosperous, knowledgeable, respected, non-celibate, and loved. Compared to their opposites, these objects of striving are conducive to reproduction. The function of happiness would be to mobilize the mind to seek the keys to Darwinian fitness. When we are unhappy, we work for the things that make us happy; when we are happy, we keep the status quo. The problem is, how much fitness is worth striving for?
author: Steven Pinker, How the Mind Works

quote: The power of a smile is such that even drawing a happy face on a piece of paper makes your lips turn up.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway

quote: How to be happy in life? The short and simple answer is to SMILE more often!
author: Al Munoz

quote: Life is a difficult thing to understand. It makes us too much happy and suddenly takes away the happiness. But we should smile in every phase of the life.

quote: Having someone this male next to her made her soul feel exhilarated and convey brazenly suggestive, female, liberal ideas to her inner id.
author: Missy Lyons, Alien Promise

quote: Maybe we should remember to smile more often. You know, just for the sake of smiling.
author: Gabe Berman, Live Like a Fruit Fly: The Secret You Already Know
category: happy, idea, joy, peace, smile, smiles

quote: Martha told me, "I don't know how you're going to talk about romance in your book, but you're going to have to because its truly part of all our lives down there-and in a big way- because its an incredibly sensuous environment. Think of how many times you've fallen in love down there, and how many times people have fallen in love with you. Its a place where we shine. We're the happiest in our lives. We're vibrant. We're just so full of life, and not only does that put you in the mood for love, it sets you up for it. People are really drawn to people who are shining, who feel so happy where they are and who they are and what they're doing and who they're doing it with.
author: Martha Clark

quote: I love you , I love you, I love you, I will say it a million more times if I have to.
author: brody campbell

quote: Whatever circumstances may occur, just stay calm and be HAPPY for our rest of life....
author: Ish Vanity Wanderer Ish

quote: Truth is very important for live happy.
author: Jagannath Hembram

quote: When you rise in the morning, form a resolution to make the day a happy one for a fellow creature.
author: Sydney Smith
category: creature, day, happy, morning, resolution, rise, wake-up

quote: Every answer you ever need lies within your own silence..
author: Ian Tucker, Your Simple Path - Find Happiness in every step.
category: happiness, happy, peace, reiki, self-help, zen

quote: Being happy is easy. Easy until you start believing that happiness is tied to a relationship, a job, your income, a product you buy, fame, a status, or any of a number of things that you don't currently have in your possession. Being happy is easy, as long as you understand everything you need to be happy exist in you already. You just have to stop looking out and start looking in to find it.
author: Sean   King

quote: Don't be sad because it's over. Be happy because you can start over.
author: Ria Tumimomor

quote: There will always be a down but also always an up, your moods depends on wich of the two you pay the most attention to.

quote: The commencement of true happiness is the realization that your happiness begins with you.
author: Ogwo David Emenike, Happiness Recipe: Eat and Stay Happy

quote: The peak of happiness is attained when a person has accepted to be what he is.
author: Ogwo David Emenike, Happiness Recipe: Eat and Stay Happy

quote: First seek happiness from within, then you will find it without.
author: Ogwo David Emenike, Happiness Recipe: Eat and Stay Happy

quote: ...the most beautiful things don't always make you happy - often they make you weep...
author: John Geddes, A Familiar Rain

quote: All of us are in the manufacturing industry - manufacturing either our own happiness or unhappiness.
author: Ogwo David Emenike, Happiness Recipe: Eat and Stay Happy

quote: There is a good life. The goodnews is that you can live that good life. The good life is the happy life. To live this good life, be happy! A truly happy man is a good man.
